name: Unanimous Studios
description:
Unanimous Studios Is A Mobile Apps & Game Development Company Founded In 2008. We are among the pioneers in the early adaptation of latest technologies to full the demands of our client and emerging tech market.
We are a team of young and highly motivated individuals who specializes in multiple technological domain.
We have worked with different clients from all across the globe & help them launch their mobile apps and game ideas.
We have worked on over 200+ niche based apps & game and published over 5000 apps on appstore for our clients in last 6 years.
Our expertise is across a range of services, which are integrated with best practices in Agile and Design Thinking to build future ready software products and platforms for global businesses.
Mobile App Development (iOS, Android and React Native)
Web Development (.NET, Java, Python, PHP and ReactJS)
e-Commerce Development (Custom, OpenCart, wordpress and Magento)
User Experience Design
CMS Portal Development (Kentico and Drupal)
READ MORE...
